issue.title: [Python] Extra file _table_api.h generated during Python build process
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-821](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-821). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-821?focusedCommentId=15969979) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
This file is generated on purpose currently by Cython to provide an (unofficial) API to box an Arrow::Table from C++ to Python for Arrow/Python consumers that don't use Cython.
